What is the best type of telescope for viewing planets?
Plan: 1) Search for the best type of telescope for viewing planets. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the best type of telescope for viewing planets.
Refractor telescopes are often recommended for viewing planets due to their high contrast and sharp images.
